description: Base kill list rules - standard template smells to avoid

rules.pattern: More than 2 consecutive card grid sections
rules.description: Repetitive card grids signal template assembly. Breaks visual rhythm.

detection.visual: Count consecutive sections using 3+ column card layouts
detection.code: grid-cols-3 or grid-cols-4 in consecutive sections

rules.alternative: Break rhythm with full-width text, split-panel, or asymmetric sections
exceptions: Portfolio/gallery pages where grid is content-appropriate

rules.pattern: Hero section ending with hard line at fold
rules.description: Hard fold lines discourage scrolling. Content should tease below.

detection.visual: Check if hero has clear bottom edge with no peek from next section

rules.alternative: Next section peeks up, image bleeds past fold, or gradient fades
exceptions: Above-fold conversion pages where scroll is not the goal

rules.description: Regular alternation reads as template logic, not intentional design.

detection.visual: Check section backgrounds follow A-B-A-B pattern
detection.code: bg-white, bg-gray, bg-white pattern in sections

rules.alternative: Group related sections into visual chapters with shared backgrounds

rules.pattern: Center-aligned text blocks longer than 3 lines
rules.description: Centered long text is harder to read and signals lazy layout.
rules.alternative: Left-align by default. Reserve centering for headlines and short labels.
exceptions: Poetry, quotes under 3 lines, call-to-action sections

rules.pattern: Symmetric Sandwich layout (Center text - Center image - Center text)
rules.description: This layout is the default AI generation pattern.

detection.visual: Look for text-image-text with all elements centered

rules.alternative: Force asymmetry with offset images, bleeds, or split layouts

rules.description: This is THE most common template tell. Avoid at all costs.

detection.visual: Hover over cards and check for lift + shadow effect

rules.alternative: Use internal element changes: border color, image zoom, text reveal, button appear

rules.pattern: Row of 4 icons with default Lucide/Heroicons
rules.description: Icon rows with default icons scream 'generated from template'.

detection.visual: Check for 4 icons in a row with standard library icons

rules.alternative: Use custom illustrated icons or feature lists with screenshots
exceptions: When icons are custom-designed for the brand

rules.description: Default shadows lack intentionality.
rules.alternative: Use border, colored shadows (shadow-blue-500/20), or background contrast

rules.description: Single border radius throughout lacks visual hierarchy.
rules.alternative: Mix radii: pill buttons + sharper cards create hierarchy

rules.description: Auto-rotating carousels with dot navigation are template defaults.

detection.visual: Carousel with < > arrows and dot indicators
detection.code: embla-carousel or swiper with default dots

rules.alternative: Static featured testimonial OR scroll-triggered sequence
exceptions: When client has 10+ high-quality testimonials with video

rules.description: Default chevron arrows on accordions are ubiquitous.
rules.alternative: Use +/- signs, custom icons, or numbered expand states

rules.description: These words are statistically over-represented in AI output.
rules.alternative: Use construction verbs: Build, Fix, Deploy, Ship, Design, Write

rules.pattern: Exclamation marks in H1 or H2
rules.description: Exclamation marks reduce authority and feel salesy.
rules.alternative: Use periods for authority. Let content create excitement.
exceptions: Playful/casual brand voice with documented rationale

rules.description: Generic contact headers waste CTA opportunity.

detection.code: Section header text 'Contact Us' or 'Get in Touch'

rules.alternative: 'Start Your Project', 'Get a Quote', 'Book a Call'

rules.description: Copy without numbers, dates, or proper nouns is template filler.

detection.visual: Check if any sentence has a number, date, or proper noun

rules.alternative: Every H2 needs a number, date, or proper noun

rules.description: Hiding pricing, wait times, or constraints reduces trust.

detection.visual: Check if pricing, wait times, minimums are visible

rules.alternative: Explicitly state: 'Min budget $5k', 'Waitlist: 2 weeks', 'License #305428C'
exceptions: Complex B2B where pricing requires consultation

rules.description: Generic CTAs reduce conversion and signal template assembly.
rules.alternative: Action-specific: 'Join the Expedition', 'Get Your Quote', 'Start Building'

rules.description: Purple-skin giant-limb illustrations are the #1 template indicator.

detection.visual: Check for flat vector people with unnatural colors

rules.alternative: Real photography, abstract geometric patterns, or custom illustration

rules.description: The colorful blurred gradient blobs are peak template aesthetic.

detection.visual: Look for blurred colorful shapes in background

rules.alternative: Sharp defined shapes, noise textures, or solid colors

rules.description: The 'laptop with app' pattern is overused.

detection.visual: Standard MacBook mockup with screenshot inside

rules.alternative: Creatively cropped/skewed screenshots, or real usage photography
exceptions: When showing actual app interface is necessary

rules.description: Logo walls without context are weak trust signals.

detection.visual: Row of grayscale logos without text or links

rules.alternative: 'Trusted by X for [specific task]' with case study links
exceptions: When accompanied by Level 3+ proof elsewhere

rules.description: 'Great service!' quotes damage credibility.
rules.alternative: Full name, role, company, AND specific outcome required

rules.description: 'Home, Features, Pricing, Contact' is template default.
rules.alternative: Action-oriented: 'Find a Store', 'Start Project', 'See Pricing'
